channel.title: Generative models on
channel.description: Recent content in Generative models on

item.title: MPCC: Matching priors and conditional for clustering
item.description: Generative adversarial model for clustering. This model is derived from a KL Divergence perspective between inference and generative distributions.

item.title: Generative-inference models: Theory and empirical analysis (Part II)
item.description: Many Generative models have an infertence counter part. In this work we explore how they are formulated. We also studied their representation learning and generative capabilities theoretically and empirically.

item.title: Generative-inference models: Theory and empirical analysis (Part I)
item.description: Many Generative models have an infertence counter part. In this work we explore how they are formulated. We also studied their representation learning and generative capabilities theoretically and empirically.

item.title: AGP: Amortized Gaussian Process
item.description: Amortized Gaussian Process is a model that amortizes the computation of a Gaussian Process. With this model we can use autoencoder for time series with variable length and irregular sampling.

item.title: LGAd: Lightcurve generative model for anomaly detection
item.description: We present LGAd, a variational autoencoder for anomaly detection in time series. Anomaly detection is fundamental task in astroinformatics that could allows us to find new astronomical objects not observed in the past.
